acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped long values with @PodamLongValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleLongValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.LongValuePojo

Then the Object LongRangeValuesPojo ( longFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 longFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 41 longFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 168 longFieldWithPreciseValue = 12345678912 longObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 longObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 69 longObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 748 longObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 12345678912 ) should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be greater or equal to zero
Then the long field 41 should be less than 100
Then the long field 168 should have a value comprised between 0 and 1000
Then the long object value 0 should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be greater or equal to zero
Then the long object value 69 should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be less than 100
Then the long object value 748 should not be null
Then the long field 748 should have a value comprised between 0 and 1000
Then the long value should be precisely 12345678912
Then the long object value 12345678912 should not be null
Then the long value should be precisely 12345678912
